epics.title: User Authentication System
epics.summary: Implement a secure user authentication system
epics.description: Develop a login system with multi-factor authentication (MFA) to ensure the security of user accounts. This system should include email/SMS-based OTP (one-time password) verification and support for biometric authentication methods. The authentication system must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing security infrastructure.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard for users
epics.description: Build a user-friendly dashboard that displays personalized banking products and services based on user profiles and eligibility. The dashboard should offer an intuitive interface and provide quick access to various features and services the user might need.

epics.title: Account Management Workflows
epics.summary: Enable streamlined workflows for account management
epics.description: Implement workflows to allow users to submit account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. Include features for users to save incomplete applications and return to them later, and the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface.

epics.title: Real-time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and notifications
epics.description: Develop a notification system to provide real-time status updates and email notifications regarding users' submitted requests. Ensure that users receive timely information about the processing stages of their requests.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.description: Create a module to maintain a comprehensive history of all user interactions. This module should log all transactions and interactions while ensuring the user's sensitive financial data remains secure.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive across devices
epics.description: Develop a responsive design to provide a consistent user experience across various devices, including desktop, tablet, and mobile phones. Test the portal thoroughly on different screen sizes to ensure optimal performance.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking System
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the self-service portal with the bank's existing core banking system. Maintain a separate database for the portal to ensure optimal performance and reliability while synchronizing necessary data between the systems.

epics.title: Role-based Access Controls
epics.description: Develop and enforce role-based access controls to ensure users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. Ensure these controls are robust and compliant with the bank's security policies.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
user_stories.description: As a user, I want multi-factor authentication to secure my account, so that I can protect my sensitive information from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: MFA should include email/SMS-based OTP and support for biometric methods.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: MFA mechanism implemented, users receive OTP via email/SMS/biometric verification, authentication integrates with existing security systems.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user login attempt, When OTP is requested, Then user receives OTP via email/SMS/biometric.

user_stories.title: Integrate Authentication with Bank Security Infrastructure
user_stories.description: As a security administrator, I want the authentication system to integrate with our existing security infrastructure, so that we can maintain a unified security posture across all systems.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Seamless integration, compatibility with existing security measures.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Authentication system integrated with existing infrastructure, no conflicts or vulnerabilities introduced.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the new authentication system, When integrated, Then it should work seamlessly with existing security infrastructure.

user_stories.title: Display Personalized Banking Products
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see personalized banking products on my dashboard, so that I can easily access the services that are most relevant to me.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard displays products based on user profiles and eligibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows personalized products/services, user profile and eligibility criteria applied.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user profile, When accessing dashboard, Then personalized products/services are displayed.

user_stories.title: Intuitive Dashboard Interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an intuitive dashboard interface, so that I can quickly navigate and access various features and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User-friendly layout, quick access to key features.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Interface is intuitive, users can navigate easily and access features quickly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When using the dashboard, Then they can navigate and access features easily.

user_stories.title: Enable Account Opening Requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to submit account opening requests easily, so that I can open a new account with minimal effort.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Streamlined workflow for account opening, minimal clicks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Account opening process streamlined, users can submit requests with minimal clicks.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, When submitting account opening request, Then process is completed with minimal clicks.

user_stories.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save my incomplete account applications, so that I can return to them later without starting over.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Feature to save and resume applications, user-friendly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can save incomplete applications and resume later seamlessly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an incomplete application, When saved, Then user can resume later without starting over.

user_stories.title: Upload Documentation for Account Requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload necessary documentation directly, so that I can complete my account request efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Direct upload feature, supports various document formats.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can upload documents directly, supported formats verified.
user_stories.test_cases: Given account request, When uploading documents, Then process is seamless and formats are supported.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture diagram represents a self-service portal for a bank customer using various Azure services for frontend, backend, authentication, data management, integration services, monitoring, DevOps, and security.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture for a banking portal has been enhanced to address critical reliability and security gaps, including the addition of disaster recovery mechanisms, Azure Web Application Firewall, and Azure Load Testing. Monitoring and cost optimization practices are recommended for further improvement. The updated architecture ensures a robust, scalable, and secure solution with high availability and performance.
